# Data Cleaning for Hurricane Dataset

## Importing Libraries

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
```

## Loading the Dataset

```{python}
df = pd.read_csv('Atlantic_Hurricanes_1970-2024.csv')
def check_all(df):
    print(df.head())
    print(df.info())
    print(df.describe())

check_all(df)
```

## Tidying

```{python}
# Convert column names to snake_case
df = df.rename(columns={
    "OBJECTID": "object_id",
    "SID": "sid",
    "BASIN": "basin",
    "SUBBASIN": "sub_basin",
    "NAME": "name",
    "NATURE": "nature",
    "Date": "date",
    "LAT": "latitude",
    "LON": "longitude",
    "USA_WIND": "usa_wind",
    "USA_PRES": "usa_pres",
})

check_all(df)
```
